trans-unit.source: Controls rights to access HTTP Internet resources.
trans-unit.target: 控制 HTTP Internet 资源的访问权。

trans-unit.source: WebPermission provides a set of methods and properties to control access to Internet resources.
trans-unit.target: WebPermission 提供一组方法和属性来控制对 Internet 资源的访问。

trans-unit.source: You can use a WebPermission to provide either restricted or unrestricted access to your resource, based on the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> that is set when the WebPermission is created.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 WebPermission 以提供对你的资源，根据受限制或不受限制访问<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>WebPermission 创建时设置。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: Create a WebPermission instance by calling its constructor using one of the following sets of parameters: - No parameters.
trans-unit.target: 创建 WebPermission 实例通过调用其构造函数，使用以下参数集之一:-没有参数。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> is <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>为<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: - A <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: Specify either <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> to allow any URI to be used in the target class, or <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> to allow access only to URIs that you specify through the use of the <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>以允许在目标类中，使用任何 URI 或<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>以允许仅对使用指定的 Uri 访问<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>方法。</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess> value and a URI string.
trans-unit.target: -A<xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>值和 URI 字符串。</xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>

trans-unit.source: The specified URI has permissions granted by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess> value.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 URI 已授予的权限<xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>值。</xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess> specifier and URI regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -A<xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>说明符和 URI 正则表达式。</xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A> and <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A> hold the URIs to which you have granted access permission.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A>和<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A>保存已向其授予访问权限的 Uri。</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A>

trans-unit.source: To add a URI to either of these lists, use <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要将 URI 添加到其中任何一个列表中，使用<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>。</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you pass <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess> as the <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess> parameter, the URI will be added to the <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你通过<xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>作为<xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>参数，URI 将添加到<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A>。</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess> </xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>

trans-unit.source: WebPermission will allow connections to your target class with URIs matching the <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A>.
trans-unit.target: WebPermission 将允许连接到你的目标类与 Uri 匹配<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A>.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > To deny access to an Internet resource, you must deny access to all the possible paths to that resource.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 要拒绝对 Internet 资源的访问，你必须拒绝访问对该资源的所有可能路径。

trans-unit.source: This requires calling <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> with state parameter set to <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 这要求<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>与状态参数设置为<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>.</xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A></xref:System.Net.WebPermission.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>调用

trans-unit.source: A better approach is to allow access to the specific resource only.
trans-unit.target: 更好的方法是允许访问特定资源的权限。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this subject, refer to the [NIB: Using the Deny Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/6b4d2e01-c504-4ac3-b50e-d6f5e7f5df25) topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关此主题的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用 Deny 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/6b4d2e01-c504-4ac3-b50e-d6f5e7f5df25)主题。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You need to deny access using only the resource canonical path.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 需要拒绝使用仅规范的资源路径的访问。

trans-unit.source: There is no need to use all the path's syntactical variations.
trans-unit.target: 没有无需使用的路径的所有语法变体。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > User name and default port information is stripped from the <xref:System.Uri> before the comparison with the regular expression argument that is supplied to the <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.%23ctor%28System.Net.NetworkAccess%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 从中提取出来用户名称和默认端口信息<xref:System.Uri>之前与提供给正则表达式参数的比较结果<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.%23ctor%28System.Net.NetworkAccess%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex%29>构造函数。</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.%23ctor%28System.Net.NetworkAccess%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex%29> </xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: If the regular expression contains user information or the default port number, then all incoming <xref:System.Uri>s will fail to match the regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 如果正则表达式包含用户信息或默认端口号，则所有传入<xref:System.Uri>s 将无法与正则表达式匹配。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref:System.Net.WebPermission>类</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>的新实例

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an empty permission that does not grant any rights.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建空的权限，不会授予任何权限。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> class that passes all demands or fails all demands.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>通过所有的类要求或所有请求都失败。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `state` parameter is either <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState?displayProperty=fullName>, respectively yielding fully restricted or fully unrestricted access to all security variables.
trans-unit.target: 值`state`参数可以是<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState?displayProperty=fullName>分别生成完全受限制或完全无限制地访问所有安全变量。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you specify <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState?displayProperty=fullName>, then you can give access to individual URIs using <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState?displayProperty=fullName>，然后您可以授予对单个 Uri 使用<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>访问</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> class with the specified access rights for the specified URI.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>类替换为指定的 URI 的指定的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> and grants its target permission to either make a remote host connection or accept a remote host connection using the URI described by the `uriString` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Net.WebPermission>并授予其目标权限，或者允许远程主机连接或接受使用所描述的 URI 的远程主机连接`uriString`参数。</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: A NetworkAccess value that indicates what kind of access to grant to the specified URI.
trans-unit.target: NetworkAccess 值，该值指示哪种访问权限授予指定的 URI。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"></xref> indicates that the application is allowed to accept connections from the Internet on a local resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"></xref>指示应用程序可以接受来自 Internet 上本地资源的连接。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"></xref> indicates that the application is allowed to connect to specific Internet resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"></xref>指示允许此应用程序连接到特定的 Internet 资源。

trans-unit.source: A URI string to which access rights are granted.
trans-unit.target: URI 字符串的访问权限授予的权限。

trans-unit.source: uriString is .
trans-unit.target: uriStringis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> class with the specified access rights for the specified URI regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>与指定的 URI 正则表达式的指定的访问权限的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> and grants its target permission to either make a remote host connection or accept a remote host connection using the URI described by the `uriRegex`parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Net.WebPermission>并授予其目标权限，或者允许远程主机连接或接受使用所描述的 URI 的远程主机连接`uriRegex`参数。</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is recommended that you create `uriRegex` using the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName> flags.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 建议你创建`uriRegex`使用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName>，和<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName>标志。</xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A candidate URI string is checked against the list of relevant regular expressions (<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A> or <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A>) in two ways.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 候选 URI 字符串已针对相关的正则表达式的列表 (<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A>或<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A>) 两种方式。</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A>

trans-unit.source: First, the candidate URI string is checked against the appropriate list; then, if there is no match, the candidate URI string is converted into a <xref:System.Uri> and checked against the appropriate list.
trans-unit.target: 首先，根据相应的列表中; 检查候选 URI 字符串然后，如果没有匹配项，则候选 URI 字符串转换为<xref:System.Uri>和相应的列表进行比照。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"></xref> value that indicates what kind of access to grant to the specified URI.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"> </xref>值，该值指示哪种访问权限授予指定的 URI。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"></xref> indicates that the application is allowed to accept connections from the Internet on a local resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"></xref>指示应用程序可以接受来自 Internet 上本地资源的连接。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"></xref> indicates that the application is allowed to connect to specific Internet resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"></xref>指示允许此应用程序连接到特定的 Internet 资源。

trans-unit.source: A regular expression that describes the URI to which access is to be granted.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式，描述为被授予访问权限的 URI。

trans-unit.source: This property returns an enumeration of a single accept permissions held by this <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的单个枚举接受权限持有此<xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The possible objects types contained in the returned enumeration are <xref:System.String> and <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 可能对象包含在返回的枚举类型<xref:System.String>和<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This property gets a list of local resources permitted by this <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取受此支持<xref:System.Net.WebPermission>。</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>允许的本地资源的列表

trans-unit.source: The class to which you have applied <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> only has permission to receive an incoming connection to local resources found in this list.
trans-unit.target: 已应用的类<xref:System.Net.WebPermission>仅有权接收到此列表中找到的本地资源的传入连接。</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can add URIs to this list using <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 可以将 Uri 添加到使用<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>此列表

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A candidate URI string is checked against the list of relevant regular expressions (AcceptList or <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A>) in two ways.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 候选 URI 字符串已针对相关的正则表达式的列表 (AcceptList 或<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A>) 两种方式。</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A>

trans-unit.source: First, the candidate URI string is checked against the appropriate list; then, if there is no match, the candidate URI string is converted into a <xref:System.Uri> and checked against the appropriate list.
trans-unit.target: 首先，根据相应的列表中; 检查候选 URI 字符串然后，如果没有匹配项，则候选 URI 字符串转换为<xref:System.Uri>和相应的列表进行比照。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface that contains accept permissions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>接口包含接受的权限。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified URI string with the specified access rights to the current <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 添加对当前的指定的访问权限与指定的 URI 字符串<xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If you have specified <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> as the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>, use AddPermission to permit the use of `uriString` in the target class.
trans-unit.target: 如果已指定<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>作为<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>，AddPermission 用于允许使用`uriString`目标类中</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState></xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: The way that `uriString` can be used by the target class is specified by `access`.
trans-unit.target: 方式`uriString`可以使用目标类指定通过`access`。

trans-unit.source: Specify <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess> as the access parameter to add the URI specified by the `uriString` parameter to the list of URI accept strings, or specify <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess> as the access parameter to add the URI to the list of URI connect strings.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>作为要添加指定的 URI 的访问参数`uriString`到 URI 列表的参数接受字符串，或指定<xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>参数来将 URI 添加到的 URI 的列表为访问连接字符串。</xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess> </xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Calling AddPermission on <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState><xref:System.Net.WebPermission> will have no effect, because permission is granted to all URIs.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 上调用 AddPermission<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState><xref:System.Net.WebPermission>将不起作用，因为所有 Uri 都授予的权限。</xref:System.Net.WebPermission></xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A candidate URI string is checked against the list of relevant regular expressions (<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A> or <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A>) in two ways.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 候选 URI 字符串已针对相关的正则表达式的列表 (<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A>或<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A>) 两种方式。</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A>

trans-unit.source: First, the candidate URI string is checked against the appropriate list; then, if there is no match, the candidate URI string is converted into a <xref:System.Uri> and checked against the appropriate list.
trans-unit.target: 首先，根据相应的列表中; 检查候选 URI 字符串然后，如果没有匹配项，则候选 URI 字符串转换为<xref:System.Uri>和相应的列表进行比照。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"></xref> that specifies the access rights that are granted to the URI.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"> </xref> ，它指定到 URI 授予的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: A string that describes the URI to which access rights are granted.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，描述的访问权限授予的权限的 URI。

trans-unit.source: uriString is .
trans-unit.target: uriStringis .

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified URI with the specified access rights to the current <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 添加对当前的指定的访问权限指定的 URI <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If you have specified <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> as the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>, use <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A> to allow the use of `uriRegex` in the target class.
trans-unit.target: 如果已指定<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>作为<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>，使用<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>以允许使用`uriRegex`目标类中</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A></xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState></xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: Specify <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess> as the `access` parameter to add the URI specified by the `uriRegex` parameter to the list of URI accept strings, or specify <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess> as the access parameter to add the URI to the list of URI connect strings.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>作为`access`参数将添加指定的 URI`uriRegex`到 URI 列表的参数接受字符串，或指定<xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>参数来将 URI 添加到的 URI 的列表为访问连接字符串。</xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess> </xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Calling <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A> on an <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState><xref:System.Net.WebPermission> instance will have no effect as permission is granted to all URIs.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 调用<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>上<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState><xref:System.Net.WebPermission>实例将产生任何影响，如权限授予所有 Uri。</xref:System.Net.WebPermission></xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is recommended that you create `uriRegex` using the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName> flags.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 建议你创建`uriRegex`使用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName>，和<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName>标志。</xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A candidate URI string is checked against the list of relevant regular expressions (<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A> or <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A>) in two ways.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 候选 URI 字符串已针对相关的正则表达式的列表 (<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A>或<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A>) 两种方式。</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A>

trans-unit.source: First, the candidate URI string is checked against the appropriate list; then, if there is no match, the candidate URI string is converted into a <xref:System.Uri> and checked against the appropriate list.
trans-unit.target: 首先，根据相应的列表中; 检查候选 URI 字符串然后，如果没有匹配项，则候选 URI 字符串转换为<xref:System.Uri>和相应的列表进行比照。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: A NetworkAccess that specifies the access rights that are granted to the URI.
trans-unit.target: 指定到 URI 授予的访问权限 NetworkAccess。

trans-unit.source: A regular expression that describes the set of URIs to which access rights are granted.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式描述的 Uri 的访问权限授予的权限集。

trans-unit.source: The uriRegex parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The uriRegex parameter is .

trans-unit.source: This property returns an enumeration of a single connect permissions held by this <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的单个枚举连接权限持有此<xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The possible objects types contained in the returned enumeration are <xref:System.String> and <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 可能对象包含在返回的枚举类型<xref:System.String>和<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This property gets a list of remote resources that are permitted by this <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取所允许的此<xref:System.Net.WebPermission>。</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>的远程资源的列表

trans-unit.source: The class to which you have applied <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> only has permission to connect with resources found in this list.
trans-unit.target: 已应用的类<xref:System.Net.WebPermission>仅有权连接与此列表中找到的资源。</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can add URIs to this list using <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 可以将 Uri 添加到使用<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>此列表

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A candidate URI string is checked against the list of relevant regular expressions (<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A> or ConnectList) in two ways.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 候选 URI 字符串已针对相关的正则表达式的列表 (<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A>或 ConnectList) 两种方式。</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A>

trans-unit.source: First, the candidate URI string is checked against the appropriate list; then, if there is no match, the candidate URI string is converted into a <xref:System.Uri> and checked against the appropriate list.
trans-unit.target: 首先，根据相应的列表中; 检查候选 URI 字符串然后，如果没有匹配项，则候选 URI 字符串转换为<xref:System.Uri>和相应的列表进行比照。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface that contains connect permissions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>包含的接口的连接权限。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of a <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建一份<xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.IPermission> returned by this method represents the same access to resources as the original <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.IPermission>返回的相同资源的访问权限与原始<xref:System.Net.WebPermission>.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>此方法表示</xref:System.Security.IPermission>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Copy%2A> and is implemented to support the <xref:System.Security.IPermission> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将替代<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Copy%2A>和实现是为了支持<xref:System.Security.IPermission>接口。</xref:System.Security.IPermission> </xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Copy%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> class that has the same values as the original.
trans-unit.target: 新实例<xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>类具有与原始相同的值。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 重新构造<xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>从 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: The FromXml method reconstructs a <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> from an XML encoding that is defined by the <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement> class.
trans-unit.target: FromXml 方法重新构造<xref:System.Net.WebPermission>从 XML 编码，由定义<xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>类。</xref:System.Security.SecurityElement> </xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ToXml%2A> method to XML-encode the <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>, including state information.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ToXml%2A>方法进行 XML 编码<xref:System.Net.WebPermission>，包括状态信息。</xref:System.Net.WebPermission> </xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ToXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding from which to reconstruct the <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要从中重新构造 XML 编码<xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: securityElement 参数是

trans-unit.source: securityElement is not a permission element for this type.
trans-unit.target: securityElement不是此类型的权限元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns the logical intersection of two <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> instances.
trans-unit.target: 返回两个逻辑交集<xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: Intersect returns a <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> that contains those permissions that are common in both `target` and the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 相交返回<xref:System.Net.WebPermission>包含中共这些权限`target`和当前实例。</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Intersect%2A> and is implemented to support the <xref:System.Security.IPermission> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将替代<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Intersect%2A>和实现是为了支持<xref:System.Security.IPermission>接口。</xref:System.Security.IPermission> </xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Intersect%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> to compare with the current instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>与当前实例进行比较。

trans-unit.source: A new that represents the intersection of the current instance and the target parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个新 ，表示当前实例的交集和 target 参数。

trans-unit.source: If the intersection is empty, the method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果交集为空，该方法返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: target is not or of type
trans-unit.target: target不是或类型

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> is a subset of the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否当前<xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>是指定的对象的子集。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> specifies a set of associated resources that is wholly contained by the `target` parameter, then the current <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> is a subset of `target`.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Net.WebPermission>指定一组完全包含的关联资源`target`参数，则当前<xref:System.Net.WebPermission>是的子集`target`。</xref:System.Net.WebPermission> </xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides IsSubsetOf and is implemented to support the <xref:System.Security.IPermission> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重写 IsSubsetOf 和实现是为了支持<xref:System.Security.IPermission>接口。</xref:System.Security.IPermission>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> to compare to the current <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>要与当前<xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: if the current instance is a subset of the target parameter; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果当前实例是的子集 target 参数; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: If the target is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for an empty current permission that is not unrestricted and <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，该方法返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>对不是不受限制的空的当前权限和<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>否则为。

trans-unit.source: The target parameter is not an instance of <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 目标参数不是实例的<xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The current instance contains a Regex-encoded right and there is not exactly the same right found in the target instance.
trans-unit.target: 当前实例包含一个正则表达式编码权限并不是正好有相同的权限在目标实例中找到。

trans-unit.source: Checks the overall permission state of the <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 检查的总体权限状态<xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> is <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>, then the target class can use all URIs.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebPermission>是<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>，则目标类可以使用所有的 Uri。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, specific permission must be given for any URI you want to use with the target class.
trans-unit.target: 否则，为你想要使用的目标类的任何 URI，必须授予特定权限。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Use <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A> to add a URI and specify its permissions.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 使用<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>添加一个 URI，并指定其权限。</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> was created with the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref><xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if the <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> was created with the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref><xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of a <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 创建的 XML 编码<xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>及其当前状态。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.FromXml%2A> method to restore the state information from a <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.FromXml%2A>要还原状态信息从一种<xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>。</xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>方法</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.FromXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.SecurityElement"></xref> that contains an XML-encoded representation of the <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>, including state information.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.SecurityElement"> </xref> ，其中包含的 XML 编码表示形式<xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>，包括状态信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns the logical union between two instances of the <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 返回两个实例之间的逻辑联合<xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Union returns a <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> that contains all the permissions in both `target` and the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回联合<xref:System.Net.WebPermission>包含中的所有权限`target`和当前实例。</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> to combine with the current <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A that represents the union of the current instance and the target parameter.
trans-unit.target: A ，表示同时兼具当前实例与 target 参数。

trans-unit.source: If either <xref uid="langword_csharp_WebPermission" name="WebPermission" href=""></xref> is <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref>, the method returns a <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: If either <xref uid="langword_csharp_WebPermission" name="WebPermission" href=""></xref> is <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref>, the method returns a <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the target is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the method returns a copy of the current <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>.
